lead_paragraph: The Sundance Film Festival’s grand jury prize in the United States dramatic competition was given to the bleak movie “Winter’s Bone” on Saturday night, while the war picture “Restrepo,” won the grand jury prize for a domestic documentary.
snippet: The Sundance Film Festival’s grand jury prize in the United States dramatic competition was given to the bleak movie “Winter’s Bone” on Saturday night, while the war picture “Restrepo,” won the grand jury prize for a domestic documentary.

headline.sub: Deep Debt Forcing Pasadena Playhouse to Close ;
